text: En nombre del amor (In the Name of Love) is a Mexican telenovela. It is produced by Televisa. In 2010 it won two Premios TVyNovelas awards. The first was for "Best Breakthrough Male" and went to Sebastián Zurita. Leticia Calderón won the "Best Actress Antagonist" award. == References == == Other websites == * Category:2008 television series debuts Category:Telenovelas by Televisa Category:2009 television series endings Category:2008 establishments in North America Category:2000s Mexican television series debuts Category:2009 disestablishments in Mexico
title: En nombre del amor
